root.description: The air becomes colder as you go down the stairs.

exit.description: To the north, stairs lead upward.
exit.detailedDescription: The stairs are made of stone slabs. The air above is warmer.

exit.description: To the south, the narrow hall runs further down.
exit.detailedDescription: The hall is dark, but sparse torches hang along the way.

exit.description: To the west, there is a locked door, but there is small gap between it and the floor.
exit.detailedDescription: The door is locked, but you cannot see how. From behind the door, a boy speaks, "This door is locked from the inside. The goblins forced me to lock it and pass the key under the door. They told me the would send rats under the door if I didn't obey. I gave them the key, but the rats came anyways. If you drop the key in the hall, I can grab it from under the door."

prop.description: The walls are of grey stone.
prop.detailedDescription: Large stones are press into the wet, dirt walls.
